name: TANK STORAGE
description:
★ Drive a car, shoot the gun with operating a tank and sometimes walk...
This is 2D top down combat vehicles shooter and adventure game.
Find the new combat vehicle for fight against many strange enemies which controlled AI, and sneak into the depths more.

★ The player units ( human and some vehicles ) are moved with keyboard operation.
That moving method works in the subjectivity direction, which like RC car driving!!
Maybe it takes a bit of getting used to.
However, It will be not only effective to control vehicles but also much fun.
The game operation is simple and the bullets does not have the limit.
however, these have realistic behavior with physical simulation.

★ key operations
【 car 】
・[W] : forward
・[S] : back
・[A] : steering wheel turn left
・[D] : steering wheel turn right

【 tank / human 】
・[W] : forward
・[S] : back
・[A] : turn left
・[D] : turn right

【 turret rotation 】
・[J] or [←] : turn left
・[L] or [→] : turn right

【 basis 】
・[space] : fire
・[Z] : get off, ride vehicle
・[C] : change weapons
・[H] : key operation reference of current vehicle
・[Esc] : pause, save, load

★ Story
Eldon Dallas is genius engineer and great wealthy man,
he is CEO of a weapon industry company.
He has been staying in a personal storage facility alone
and lost contact to him continues,
where seems to be storing many combat vehicles.
The facility is being closed by security system.
Fortunately, a vehicle for exclusive use of the facility was found outside
which probably has permission to enter inside.
And so, 'You' will visit the facility to confirm safety of Dallas.
